Class DetachmentRules

Encapsulates the rules of detachment used by WordNet.

getCandidateForms

public String[] getCandidateForms(String inflection,
                                  SynsetType type)
Returns "candidate" root forms of a possibly inflected word form. In other words, given a word form that may be inflected (e.g., the plural "airplanes") and that isn't found in that form in WordNet, this method returns potential variations (e.g., "airplane") that might be successfully retrieved instead.

Parameters:
inflection - Possibly inflected word form for which to return root candidates.
type - Type of synset for which to apply the morphology rules.
Returns:
Variations on the specified word form that may represent a valid root.
